betterquesting:10.desc:8:
After the decay subsides, decay logs, fountains will turn into spellwave goo, which in turn turns into Mystic Slime. 
 Decayed Slime will turn back into Slime (I think it's still a bit more fun to have secondary decay powder...) . 
 Corrupted Rocks turn into Permeable Rocks, which are mineral cubes that can be mined to yield products such as Crystal Shards, Raw Ore Clusters, Gems, and Seacrystal Grit, as well as a chance to spawn a single 100 elemental point Corrupted Shard, which can be used to craft an Aberration Pickaxe.
